javax.constraints.impl

Class BasicVarSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.constraints.impl.CommonBase
      • javax.constraints.impl.AbstractConstrainedVariable
        • javax.constraints.impl.BasicVarSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConstrainedVariable, VarSet

    public class BasicVarSet
extends AbstractConstrainedVariable
implements VarSet
    This class represents a basic implementation of constrained set variables.

      • setValue

        public void setValue(java.util.Set set)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: VarSet
        Instantiates this set variable with the constant "set" of integers. All integers that do not belong to the "set" will be removed from the possible set.
        Specified by:
        setValue in interface VarSet
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if some values in the "set' are not possible
